title: Challenges of blockchain adoption for manufacturing supply chain to achieve sustainability: A case of rubber industry

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Alok Yadav, Anish Sachdeva, Rajiv Kumar Garg, Karishma M. Qureshi, Bhavesh G. Mewada, Muhammad Musa Al-Qahtani, Mohamed Rafik Noor Mohamed Qureshi
